message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 60/40 split seems reasonable for the first round.
I appreciate the fairness you offered, Alice.  Let's flip the script this round. 60/40 for me seems fair to me, considering the value of money is about to decrease.
Bob, let's be realistic.  We both lose if we keep waiting. I'll take a slight hit at 55/45, but this needs to end now.
